title: If my college sends just the 'Transcript', 'degree true copy' and WES equivalency form for WES assessment, will it work? - Quora

response.answer_text: College usually send Xerox of Mark sheet of all semesterTranscript of marksheet as well as universityWES academic request formDegree certificateMake sure you keep all documents, if not you will receive mail from WES and then you can send again All the best
